text: Arkie Deya Whiteley (6 November 1964 â€“ 19 December 2001) was a British-born Australian actress. Her television and movie work included A Town Like Alice, Razorback, Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior, Gallowglass and Princess Caraboo. She also appeared in the television series Prisoner where she played Donna Mason. Whiteley died on 19 December 2001 in Sydney, Australia from adrenal cancer, aged 37. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1964 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Deaths from adrenal cancer Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Actors from London Category:Actors from Sydney Category:Naturalised citizens of Australia
title: Arkie Whiteley
